Many Hong Kong protesters end up "dying of Coronavirus"
OR ...
Many in CCP leadership end up "dying of Coronavirus"

entity.name: Hong Kong local media reports first coronavirus death
entity.description: A 39-year-old patient became the first victim of the deadly coronavirus in the city after he died on Tuesday morning due to heart failure.
